#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n, q, l, r, a, ans;
    scanf ("%d%d", &n, &q);
    int v[n];
    scanf ("%d", &v[0]);
    for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
        scanf ("%d", &a);
        v[i] = v[i-1]+a;
    }

    while (q--) {
        scanf ("%d%d", &l, &r);
        --r; --l;
        if(l==0 and r == n-1) ans = 0;
        else if (l == 0) ans = v[n-1] - v[r];
        else if (r == n-1) ans = v[l-1];
        else ans = v[n-1]- v[r] + v[l-1];
        printf("%d\n", ans);

    }
}
